sentences.sContent: He is not only a senior leader, CEO and leadership coach of his team in excellent enterprise but also a outstanding educator, elocutionist and author of many famous leadership literatures.
sentences.sContent_eng: He is not only a senior leader, CEO and leadership coach of his team in excellent enterprise but also a outstanding educator, elocutionist and author of many famous leadership literatures.
sentences.sCn: 他不仅为全球卓越企业的高层领导者、CEO及其管理团队担任领导力教练，同时也是一位杰出的教育家和演说家，以及多部领导力著作和文献的作者。

words.tran: 朗诵；作慷慨激昂的演说
朗读出；慷慨激昂地讲出
